original: iti tenārthito rājñā vetālo nijagāda saḥ // SoKss_12,32.25 (Vet_25.25) //

original: evam astu viśeṣaṃ ca śṛṇu vacmy atra bhūtale /

original: yāś caturviṃśatiḥ pūrvā yaiṣā caikā samāpinī // SoKss_12,32.26 (Vet_25.26) //
analyzed: yāḥ caturviṃśatiḥ pūrvāḥ yā eṣā ca ekā samāpinī

analyzed: kathā āvalī iyam vetālapañcaviṃśatika ākhyayā

original: khyātā jagati pūjyā ca śivā caiva bhaviṣyati // SoKss_12,32.27 (Vet_25.27) //
analyzed: khyātā jagati pūjyā ca śivā ca eva bhaviṣyati  /

original: yaḥ ślokamātram apy asyāḥ kathayiṣyati sādaraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ śloka mātram api asyāḥ kathayiṣyati sādaraḥ

original: yo vā śroṣyati tau sadyo muktapāpau bhaviṣyataḥ // SoKss_12,32.28 (Vet_25.28) //
analyzed: yaḥ vā śroṣyati tau sadyas mukta pāpau bhaviṣyataḥ  /

original: yakṣavetālakūṣmāṇḍaḍākinīrākṣasādayaḥ /
analyzed: yakṣa vetāla kūṣmāṇḍa ḍākinī rākṣasa ādayaḥ

original: na tatra prabhaviṣyanti yatraiṣā kīrtayiṣyate // SoKss_12,32.29 (Vet_25.29) //
analyzed: na tatra prabhaviṣyanti yatra eṣā kīrtayiṣyate  /

original: ity uktvā sa yayau tasmān nirgatya nṛkalevarāt /
analyzed: iti uktvā sa yayau tasmāt nirgatya nṛ kalevarāt

original: yathābhirucitaṃ dhāma vetālo yogamāyayā // SoKss_12,32.30 (Vet_25.30) //
analyzed: yathā abhirucitam dhāma vetālaḥ yoga māyayā

original: tatas tatra suraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājñas tasya maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tatas tatra suraiḥ sārdham rājñaḥ tasya maheśvaraḥ

original: sākṣād āvirabhūt tuṣṭaḥ praṇataṃ cādideśa tam // SoKss_12,32.31 (Vet_25.31) //
analyzed: sākṣāt āvirabhūt tuṣṭaḥ praṇatam ca ādideśa tam

original: sādhu vatsa hato 'dyāyaṃ yat tvayā kūṭatāpasaḥ /
analyzed: sādhu vatsa hataḥ adya ayam yat tvayā kūṭa tāpasaḥ

original: vidyādharamahācakravartitāhaṭhakāmukaḥ // SoKss_12,32.32 (Vet_25.32) //
tvam ādau vikramādityaḥ sṛṣṭo 'bhūḥ svāṃśato mayā /
analyzed: tvam ādau vikramādityaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ abhūḥ sva aṃśataḥ mayā

original: mleccharūpāvatīrṇānām asurāṇāṃ praśāntaye // SoKss_12,32.33 (Vet_25.33) //
analyzed: mleccha rūpa avatīrṇānām asurāṇām praśāntaye

original: adya coddāmadurvṛttadamanāya mayā punaḥ /
analyzed: adya ca uddāma durvṛtta damanāya mayā punar

original: tvaṃ trivikramasenākhyo hīraḥ sṛṣṭo 'tra bhūpatiḥ // SoKss_12,32.34 (Vet_25.34) //
analyzed: tvam trivikramasena ākhyaḥ hīraḥ sṛṣṭaḥ atra bhūpatiḥ

original: vidyādharāṇam acirād adhirājo bhaviṣyasi // SoKss_12,32.35 (Vet_25.35) //

original: aparājitanāmānaṃ khaḍgaṃ caitaṃ gṛhāṇa me /
analyzed: aparājita nāmānam khaḍgam ca etam gṛhāṇa me

original: yasya prasādāt sarvaṃ tvaṃ prāpsyasy etad yathoditam // SoKss_12,32.37 (Vet_25.37) //

original: ity uktvā khaḍgaratnaṃ tad dattvā tasmai mahībhṛte /

analyzed: tatra krama avagata rātri viceṣṭitābhiḥ abhyarcitaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ vitata utsavābhiḥ

original: snānapradānagiriśārcananṛttagītavādyādibhis tad akhilaṃ sa dinaṃ nināya // SoKss_12,32.40 (Vet_25.40) //

original: alpair eva ca vāsaraiḥ sa nṛpatiḥ śārvasya vīryād aseḥ
analyzed: alpaiḥ eva ca vāsaraiḥ sa nṛpatiḥ śārvasya vīryāt aseḥ

original: sadvīpāṃ sarasā talāṃ ca bubhuje niḥkaṇṭakāṃ medinīm /

original: saṃprāpyātha harājñayā sumahatīṃ vidyādharādhīśatāṃ
analyzed: saṃprāpya atha hara ājñayā su mahatīm vidyādhara adhīśa tām

original: bhuktvā tāṃ suciraṃ jagāma bhagavatsāyujyam ante kṛtī // SoKss_12,32.41 (Vet_25.41) //
